title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Clinical Decision-Making Skills via Nursing Game-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing knowledge and understanding of healthcare systems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners improve patient assessment and priority decision-making skills in emergency scenarios by over 80% through scenario-based games
Learners apply creative approaches to resolving nursing ethics issues through in-game decision-making processes at over 90% proficiency
Learners can accurately reproduce 20 key nursing procedures with 100% precision through mobile quiz game activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
